meanings.sent1: The school's inauguration was a joyful event with music and speeches.
meanings.sent2: Presidential inaugurations are important ceremonies in the United States.
meanings.sent3: The inauguration of the new ice cream machine brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The inauguration of spring was marked by the blooming of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: Attending the inauguration of the library made me feel like a part of something special.

meanings.definition: The formal beginning or initiation of a system, policy, or period.
meanings.sent1: The inauguration of the recycling program was a step towards a cleaner environment.
meanings.sent2: Company inaugurations often involve speeches by the founders.
meanings.sent3: The inauguration of the new lunch menu was met with mixed reviews from the students.
meanings.sent4: The inauguration of the space mission marked the start of a new era in exploration.
meanings.sent5: The inauguration of the art exhibit drew a large crowd eager to see the new works.
